data.text:
There are words that I'll never forget. I'll never struggle to 
remember them, because these words will always remain in my heart.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>There are words that I'll never forget. I'll never struggle to 
<story>remember them, because these words will always remain in my heart.

data.text:
『There's no way some country bumpkins can win』 『See? Look at that』 
『That's right, there's no way we can win』
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>『There's no way some country bumpkins can win』 『See? Look at that』 
<story>『That's right, there's no way we can win』

data.text:
A racing class that was held out in the sticks. 
That was the first time I raced. There was an 
aura of resignation from those disparaging words.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>A racing class that was held out in the sticks. 
<story>That was the first time I raced. There was an 
<story>aura of resignation from those disparaging words.

data.text:
The overflowing indignation from 
their words just wouldn't disappear.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>The overflowing indignation from 
<story>their words just wouldn't disappear.

data.text:
……That's why, I'll show all of them. Everyone that looked down 
on me, and those that gave up because they couldn't keep up……!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>……That's why, I'll show all of them. Everyone that looked down 
<story>on me, and those that gave up because they couldn't keep up……!

data.text:
For all those Uma Musume from the countryside, 
I'll become their Ace――For sure, I'll show all of them……!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>For all those Uma Musume from the countryside, 
<story>I'll become their Ace――For sure, I'll show all of them……!!

data.text: That your strength has nothing to do with where you came from……!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>That your strength has nothing to do with where you came from……!!

data.text:
Like I said, I'm not saying it's bad, but it's 
too big of a dream. That's just a kid's dream.
data.name: Tired-looking Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Like I said, I'm not saying it's bad, but it's 
<story>too big of a dream. That's just a kid's dream.

data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>！？

data.text:
As a newbie, just talking about a big 
dream like that won't earn you any trust.
data.name: Tired-looking Trainer
data.processed:
<story>As a newbie, just talking about a big 
<story>dream like that won't earn you any trust.

data.text:
In the beginning, it's fine to just say something 
like 『I'll do my best for you』. It's less pressure, 
and easier for your partner to accept, right?
data.name: Tired-looking Trainer
data.processed:
<story>In the beginning, it's fine to just say something 
<story>like 『I'll do my best for you』. It's less pressure, 
<story>and easier for your partner to accept, right?

data.text: That trainer is……the one from yesterday……
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>That trainer is……the one from yesterday……

data.text:
Guiding your partner Uma Musume to the summit…… 
as a response to an interview question, it's perfect though.
data.name: Tired-looking Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Guiding your partner Uma Musume to the summit…… 
<story>as a response to an interview question, it's perfect though.

data.text:
I'm saying this for your sake, you know. A huge dream 
like that, will end up being a heavy burden for you too……
data.name: Tired-looking Trainer
data.processed:
<story>I'm saying this for your sake, you know. A huge dream 
<story>like that, will end up being a heavy burden for you too……

data.text:
I want to deny it. 
But……some of what he said can't be denied.
data.processed:
<story>I want to deny it. 
<story>But……some of what he said can't be denied.

data.text:
If there isn't a girl I'm training, 
then I can't really be called a trainer.
data.processed:
<story>If there isn't a girl I'm training, 
<story>then I can't really be called a trainer.

data.text:
It's normal for an Uma Musume to be uneasy 
if I don't even have a track record. If it's 
talking about dreams, that's something anyone can do.
data.processed:
<story>It's normal for an Uma Musume to be uneasy 
<story>if I don't even have a track record. If it's 
<story>talking about dreams, that's something anyone can do.

data.text:
Just have a more realistic dream. It's better than 
being told you're in over your head, right? Save the 
big dreams for after you've got more experience――
data.name: Tired-looking Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Just have a more realistic dream. It's better than 
<story>being told you're in over your head, right? Save the 
<story>big dreams for after you've got more experience――

data.text:
I clenched my fists tightly. I was shaken by these words, 
and it was frustrating that I had no response.
data.processed:
<story>I clenched my fists tightly. I was shaken by these words, 
<story>and it was frustrating that I had no response.

data.text: No matter how hard I tried as a trainer, if I was alone――
data.processed: <story>No matter how hard I tried as a trainer, if I was alone――

data.text: But, it's your dream isn't it?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>But, it's your dream isn't it?

data.text: Right, Trainer-san?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Right, Trainer-san?

data.text:
Ah. Y-you were listening just now……? Well, 
you could just say it was a conversation 
between adults……umm……I-I'll take my leave then!
data.name: Tired-looking Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Ah. Y-you were listening just now……? Well, 
<story>you could just say it was a conversation 
<story>between adults……umm……I-I'll take my leave then!

data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: Don't clench your fists so hard. You'll hurt yourself.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Don't clench your fists so hard. You'll hurt yourself.

data.text:
I didn't realize until she mentioned it. 
I relaxed my strength and looked at my palms. 
I could clearly see where my fingernails dug in.
data.processed:
<story>I didn't realize until she mentioned it. 
<story>I relaxed my strength and looked at my palms. 
<story>I could clearly see where my fingernails dug in.

data.text:
…………Sorry! I wasn't trying to eavesdrop 
or anything, I just happened to hear it.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>…………Sorry! I wasn't trying to eavesdrop 
<story>or anything, I just happened to hear it.

data.text:
You probably didn't want me to hear it though…… 
But, I hope you can forgive me for hearing it.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>You probably didn't want me to hear it though…… 
<story>But, I hope you can forgive me for hearing it.

data.text: Is that so? Then, let's go!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Is that so? Then, let's go!

data.text: It's fine, it's fine!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>It's fine, it's fine!

data.text:
She kept pushing me forward, eventually taking 
me to the training course. There were――
data.processed:
<story>She kept pushing me forward, eventually taking 
<story>me to the training course. There were――

data.text:
The Uma Musume known as the "Emperor", Symboli Rudolf. 
And Mr. C.B. Several other famous Uma Musume as well……
data.processed:
<story>The Uma Musume known as the "Emperor", Symboli Rudolf. 
<story>And Mr. C.B. Several other famous Uma Musume as well……

data.text: My dream is to become the Ace of the Uma Musume world!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>My dream is to become the Ace of the Uma Musume world!

data.text: By beating everyone over there.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>By beating everyone over there.

data.text:
Katsuragi Ace declared that with a 
clear voice and a cheerful laugh.
data.processed:
<story>Katsuragi Ace declared that with a 
<story>clear voice and a cheerful laugh.

data.text:
Do you think it's reckless? That a huge dream 
like that is unreachable? Do you think that?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Do you think it's reckless? That a huge dream 
<story>like that is unreachable? Do you think that?

data.text:
……There were many Uma Musume at Tracen Academy. 
They were all strong and outstanding Uma Musume.
data.processed:
<story>……There were many Uma Musume at Tracen Academy. 
<story>They were all strong and outstanding Uma Musume.

data.text:
But, it didn't matter how outstanding you were, there 
could only be a few winners. Not everyone could win.
data.processed:
<story>But, it didn't matter how outstanding you were, there 
<story>could only be a few winners. Not everyone could win.

data.text: ――However.

choices.text: Our job is to fulfill those dreams
Our job is to fulfill those dreams

data.processed: <story>――However.

data.text:
Reckless? Too big? So what? 
That's how dreams are supposed to be.
data.processed:
<story>Reckless? Too big? So what? 
<story>That's how dreams are supposed to be.

data.text:
If it's something that can be fulfilled so easily, 
rather than a dream, you might as well call them 『Plans』.
data.processed:
<story>If it's something that can be fulfilled so easily, 
<story>rather than a dream, you might as well call them 『Plans』.

data.text:
Right, that's a trainer's job. 
And, you've got a dream too right?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Right, that's a trainer's job. 
<story>And, you've got a dream too right?

data.text: Then there's no reason to back down!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Then there's no reason to back down!

data.text:
Just aim for your dream. That there might be a few 
obstacles on that long road, that's to be expected.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Just aim for your dream. That there might be a few 
<story>obstacles on that long road, that's to be expected.

data.text:
Just break through and continue on! 
Someday you'll get there! If you're committed!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Just break through and continue on! 
<story>Someday you'll get there! If you're committed!
